  19.  def setup(container: Element): Environment

    Initiates setup for the Environment.

    Initiates setup for the Environment.

    The Environment includes: - the perspective camera, - the renderer, - and the scene.

    Setup involves: - initializing camera, scene, and renderer, - loading required resources (ex: The texture for points, and data used for point positions.)

    container

    The dom element in which the renderer will display the environment.

    returns

    The environment instance.
